contentrichtext.text: '''Argiope''' ("silver face") may refer to: ==Greek Mythological Persons== * Argiope, a Naiad, a daughter of the River God Nile. She was wife of Agenor and mother of his children. More commonly known as [[Telephassa]] * Argiope, a Naiad of mount Parnassus, possibly the daughter of the river-god Cephissus, mother of [[Thamyras]] by Philammon * Argiope, a Naiad of the town of Eleusis, possibly the daughter of the river-god Cephissus, mother of [[Cercyon]] by Branchus * Argiope, daughter of [[Teuthras]], king of Teuthrania ==Other uses== * [[Argiope (spider)]], a genus of spiders which includes the St Andrew's Cross spider and the wasp spider * Argiope, a popular monster from the MMORPG [[Ragnarok Online]] {{disambig}}
